fi.grimripper.loww

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.grimripper.loww.Point

  • public abstract class Point
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstraction for a 2D point for use with different geometric libraries.
    Author:
    Marko Tuominen

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Point.PointFactory
      Interface for creating point objects.

    • Field Detail

      • factory

        protected static Point.PointFactory factory
        Creates new point objects. Must be initialized before any point objects are created.

    • Method Detail

      • createPoint

        public static Point createPoint(Point point)
        Creates a new point object, copying an existing point.
        Parameters:
        point - make a copy of this point
        Returns:
        a new point object with the same coordinates as the parameter
        See Also:
        createPoint(double, double)

      • createPoint

        public static Point createPoint(double x,
                double y)
        Creates a new point object with x- and y-coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate
        y - y-coordinate
        Returns:
        a new point object with the parameter coordinates
        See Also:
        factory

      • distance

        public static double distance(double x1,
              double y1,
              double x2,
              double y2)
        Shortcut method for calculating distance between two points.
        Parameters:
        x1 - first point's x-coordinate
        y1 - first point's y-coordinate
        x2 - second point's x-coordinate
        y2 - second point's y-coordinate
        Returns:
        distance between the points
        See Also:
        createPoint(double, double), distance(double, double)

      • approximateEquals

        public boolean approximateEquals(Point point,
                        double appr)
        Compares two points and determines if they're within a given distance of each other.
        Parameters:
        point - compare to this point
        appr - maximum allowed difference in coordinates
        Returns:
        this point is within the given distance of the other point
